name: Msrks Dev Notes
body:
## Deep Learning
see [project page](https://msrks.github.io/deeplearning/)

## Python
os.listdir 
```python
import os
for f in os.listdir('txt/'):
  # do something
```

pandas: thousands
```python
df = pd.read_csv('txt/'+f, sep='\t',names=['delay','count'],
		         thousands=',',dtype={'delay':str, 'count':int})
```

matplotlib, seaborn: rc
```python
matplotlib.rc('font', size=12)
matplotlib.rc('axes', labelsize=16, titlesize=16)
matplotlib.rc('xtick', labelsize=16)
matplotlib.rc('ytick', labelsize=16)
plt.rc('text', usetex=True)
#sns.set(font_scale=1.4)
```

matplotlib: savefig
```python
fig.savefig("hoge.png")
```

## Docker
[gitbucket](https://github.com/takezoe/gitbucket-docker)
```bash
docker run -d -p 8080:8080 takezoe/gitbucket
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
